means: 制服
军服
通讯中用以代表字母 u 的词
（形状，性质等）一样的
规格一致的
始终如一的
使规格一律
使均一
使穿制服
[电影]制服

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"相似的，类似的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alike, like, similar, comparable, parallel, uniform, identical
means: alike ：指事物在性质、特征或外貌上固有的而不是偶然的相似。普通用词，只作表语。
like ：普通用词，含义广泛，指多个或全部特性都相似，但并非同一个，也可指在某个特殊的偶然相似。
similar ：强调不同的人或事物之间完全或部分相似，暗示可暂不考虑或无视其差异之处。
comparable ：指在某一点或几点上有相似之处，可作有限或粗略的对比，尤指在价值或能力等方面可相提并论。
parallel ：主要指在外表或在性质上相似到有可以相提并论的程度。
uniform ：指在性质、数量、形态或程度等方面相似到很难看出差异的地步。
identical ：语气最强，可指同一个人或物，也可指数个人或物之间完全没有差别。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"衣服，服装"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: clothes, clothing, coat, dress, garment, robe, gown, uniform, costume, suit
means: clothes ： 普通用词，多指包括上衣、内衣或裤子等具体的一件件衣服。
clothing ： 常用词，集合名词，是衣服的总称。
coat ： 指上衣、外衣、大衣、外套及女式上装。
dress ： 多指正式场合或为某些特定用途而穿的服装，也指童装或女性穿的连衣裙。
garment ： 语气庄重，正式用词，复数形式可与clothes换用，指身上全部穿着。单数形式指单件衣服，尤指长袍、外套等外面的衣服。
robe ： 指长袍，也指浴衣、晨衣。
gown ： 指女人穿的长服，尤指教士、法官、教授等的礼服或妇女的睡衣等，也指长袍。
uniform ： 指某团体或组织统一做的制服，如军服、校服等。
costume ： 指流行某一地区或某一时代的服装，也指演员的戏装。
suit ： 指一套服装，一般有几件配成一套的套装。

sentence.Network_en: Philippe was in uniform, wearing a pistol holster on his belt.
sentence.Network_cn: 菲利普身着制服，腰带上别着手枪皮套。

sentence.Network_en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentence.Network_cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentence.Network_en: His face blanched as he looked at Sharpe's blood-drenched uniform.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一看到夏普浸满鲜血的制服，脸色顿时变得煞白。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as an adjective): from French uniforme or Latin uniformis (see uni-, form). Sense 1 of the noun dates from the mid 18th cent

encyclopedia.content: 随机函数uniform，随机，均匀，独立 设a，b为实数，a<b, 1：x=uniform(a, b); 返回为x，则a ≤ x <b ② 设i，j为整数，i≤j, uniform(i, j)=k, i ≤ k ≤ j ③ 设X是非空有限集， uniform(X) ∈ X

entry.def: A uniform is a special set of clothes which some people, for example soldiers or the police, wear to work in and which some children wear at school.

example.ex: The town police wear dark blue uniforms and flat caps...
example.tran: 镇上的警察穿着深蓝色制服，戴着鸭舌帽。

example.ex: Philippe was in uniform, wearing a pistol holster on his belt...
example.tran: 菲利普身着制服，腰带上别着手枪皮套。

entry.def: You can refer to the particular style of clothing which a group of people wear to show they belong to a group or a movement as their uniform.

example.ex: Mark's is the uniform of the young male traveller — green Army trousers, T-shirt and shirt.
example.tran: 马克一身年轻男性旅行者的典型行头——绿军裤、T恤外加衬衫。

entry.tran: （同一物）始终如一的，均匀的，划一的
entry.def: If something is uniform, it does not vary, but is even and regular throughout.

example.ex: Chips should be cut into uniform size and thickness...
example.tran: 土豆条要切得大小厚薄均匀。

example.ex: All flowing water, though it appears to be uniform, is actually divided into extensive inner surfaces, or layers, moving against one another...
example.tran: 所有流动的水看似一成不变，但实际上内部分成许多广延的面，或者说层，彼此逆向移动。

entry.tran: （不同物）全都相同的，一律的，清一色的
entry.def: If you describe a number of things as uniform, you mean that they are all the same.

example.ex: Along each wall stretched uniform green metal filing cabinets...
example.tran: 每面墙边都一溜摆着相同的绿色金属档案柜。

example.ex: Shrimp are raised in long uniform ponds, frozen in the nearby packing plant and shipped north.
example.tran: 虾放养在清一色的长池子里，再送到附近的包装车间冷冻，最后用船运往北方。

means.word_mean: 1. clothing of distinctive design worn by members of a particular group as a means of identification
1. always the same; showing a single form or character in all occurrences;

sentences.sentence: "a street of uniform tall white buildings"

means.word_mean: 2. the same throughout in structure or composition;

sentences.sentence: "bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product"

stems_affixes.word_buile: uni一个,单一+form形状→adj.一贯的,一致的
uni一个,单一+lingual语言的→adj.只用一种语言的
uni一个,单一+son声音→一个声音→和谐
cubi=cube立方体+form有……形状的→adj.立方形的
denti=dent凹,缺口+form有……形状的→adj.齿形的,齿状的

sentences.en: The new uniforms will arrive tomorrow.
Soldiers, policemen, and nurses wear uniforms.
sentences.cn: 士兵、警察和护士们都穿制服。

sentences.en: He was in uniform three years.

means.word_mean: 全都相同的, 一律的, 清一色的, 一致的, 统一的

sentences.en: The earth turns around at a uniform rate.
sentences.cn: 地球以相同的速度旋转。

sentences.en: The windows in the house are all uniform.
sentences.cn: 房子里的窗户都是一样的。

sentences.en: They are uniform in size and shape.
sentences.cn: 它们的大小和形状都相同。
